channel.title: Blogs on Project Portafolio
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on Project Portafolio

item.title: Rich Content
Credit Scoring Model
item.description: In base of the work of Naeem Siddiqi, the author of “Credit Risk Scorecards Developing and Implementing Intelligent Credit Scoring”, we are going to propose a credit scoring model for credit cards in base of the data from the bank Interbank. The purpose of the model is to find a credit profile for each customer in order to predict the default risk od the portalio. This model is going to be elaborate using python.

item.title: Credit Scoring Model
item.description: In base of the work of Naeem Siddiqi, the author of “Credit Risk Scorecards Developing and Implementing Intelligent Credit Scoring”, we are going to propose a credit scoring model for credit cards in base of the data from the bank Interbank. The purpose of the model is to find a credit profile for each customer in order to predict the default risk od the portalio. This model is going to be elaborate using python.

item.title: Sentiment analysis fo the news in the Peru: The effect on the dolar
item.description: In base of the last event in the politic field in Peru and in order to understand the impact of the market sentiment, we are going to create a sentiment index in base of the digital news of the newspaper “Gestion”. To extract the information we are goint to use techniques of web scrapping to extract all the data. After that construct a sentiment index in using NLP algorithms. This work is looking to know is there a correlation betweeen the market sentiments, how the market percives these in base of the lenguage present in the news and how the volatility of the dolar behave.
